mapper.sql: SELECT P.PROPOSE_NO, M.USER_NO, M.USER_NAME, P.PROPOSE_TITLE, P.PROPOSE_PWD, P.PROPOSE_REG_DATE, P.PROPOSE_VIEW_COUNT, P.PROPOSE_CONTENT, P.PROPOSE_STATUS FROM PROPOSE P JOIN MEMBER M ON(P.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE P.PROPOSE_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROPOSE WHERE PROPOSE_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT P.PROPOSE_NO, M.USER_NO, M.USER_NAME, P.PROPOSE_PWD FROM PROPOSE P JOIN MEMBER M ON(P.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE P.PROPOSE_NO=#{proposeNo} AND P.PROPOSE_PWD=#{proposePwd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROPOSE VALUES( SEQ_PROPOSE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{userNo}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{proposePwd}, #{proposeTitle}, TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'yy-mm-dd'), DEFAULT, #{proposeContent}, 'Y' )
mapper.update: UPDATE PROPOSE SET PROPOSE_VIEW_COUNT = (PROPOSE_VIEW_COUNT + 1) WHERE PROPOSE_NO = #{proposeNo}
UPDATE PROPOSE SET PROPOSE_STATUS='N' WHERE PROPOSE_NO=#{proposeNo}
mapper.select: SELECT PROPOSE_NO, PROPOSE_TITLE, PROPOSE_STATUS FROM PROPOSE WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY PROPOSE_NO DESC
mapper.insert: insert into comment_board values( seq_com_no.nextval, #{comWriter}, #{comContent}, default, default, default, default, #{proposeNo}, default, default )
mapper.select: SELECT CB.COM_NO, CB.COM_WRITER, CB.COM_CONTENT, CB.COM_CREATE_DATE, CB.COM_STATUS, CB.QA_NO FROM COMMENT_BOARD CB WHERE CB.QA_NO = #{proposeNo} AND CB.COM_STATUS='Y'
